author: rederpj
msg: Backport submission for util_ldap segfault fix (PR 45994)

author: rederpj
msg: *) mod_ldap: Avoid a segfault when result->rc is checked in uldap_connection_init
when result is NULL. This could happen if LDAP initialization failed.

author: rpluem
msg: * Similar to apr_strtoff reset errno to zero in apr_strtoi64.
Cases were observed where apr_strtoi64 returned with a
previously set errno although the operation worked fine.

author: sfrenot
msg: Minor bug fix, to be compatible with latest felix version.
